titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Ella and I went to the Cathedral, it being the Festival of S
Paul's Conversion, & there we received the Holy Sacrament. Also I attended Evensong and read the Lesson. The Bishop of Newcastle and M
Wild arrived to stay over the week–end.
